detectors.description:
DeligateERC20._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BTswap.sol#1297-1315) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BTswap.sol#1307)
detectors.markdown:
[DeligateERC20._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BTswap.sol#L1297-L1315) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BTswap.sol#L1307)
